LanguageData.RSCreatePeacekeeperDefender.description: The Defender Security variant features higher armour.
LanguageData.RSCreatePeacekeeperDefender.label: Create the Peacekeeper Defender Security.
LanguageData.RSCreatePeacekeeperDefenderForest.descri: The Defender Forest variant features higher melee skills and agility. It has a movement bonus on forest terrain.
LanguageData.RSCreatePeacekeeperDefenderForest.label: Create the Peacekeeper Defender Forest
LanguageData.RSCreatePeacekeeperDefenderDesert.descri: The Defender Desert variant features higher rate of fire. It has a movement bonus on desert terrain.
LanguageData.RSCreatePeacekeeperDefenderDesert.label: Create the Peacekeeper Defender Desert
LanguageData.RSCreatePeacekeeperDefenderWinter.descri: The Defender Winter variant features higher accuracy. It has a movement bonus on snowy terrain.
LanguageData.RSCreatePeacekeeperDefenderWinter.label: Create the Peacekeeper Defender Winter

LanguageData.RSCreatePeacekeeperEnforcerWinter.descri: The Enforcer Winter variant features higher accuracy. It has a movement bonus on snowy terrain.

LanguageData.RSButcherCorpsePeacekeeper.label: shred peacekeeper
LanguageData.RSButcherCorpsePeacekeeper.description: Shred a dead peacekeeper to try to salvage usable material.
LanguageData.RSSmashCorpsePeacekeeper.label: smash peacekeeper
LanguageData.RSSmashCorpsePeacekeeper.description: Smash a dead peacekeeper with simple hand tools to salvage usable material.
LanguageData.Make_SRSPowerCell.label: make powercell from chemfuel
LanguageData.Make_SRSPowerCell.description: Create an SRS powercell to aid SRS Robots travelling on long journeys.
